channel.title: 508 client error plz help
channel.description: I had problems running 508 clients but i solved that now i have a new error after i run the client it runs perfect it says runescape is loading... and it says connecting to update server but thats all it doesnt go further so the client doesnt load plz help me anyone.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 12, 2008, 01:05:07 am[/size][hr]anyone plz help?
